attributes.action: radically overhaul the system of MPs expenses for ALL categories of expenditure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The system of MPs being able to claim set allowances for expenses is archaic and has no place in a modern society.
MPs should only be able to claim ACTUAL expenditure for eventual  reimbursement.
This should cover ALL types of expenditure; from provision of a second property to meals, travel and accommodation etc.
The system of actuals has been in place with civil servants and many companies for a number of years, why should MPs have such a lavish and extravagant lifestyle supported by the British taxpayer ?
